DataSource.Sql: SELECT Text.TextID AS [KeyLevel1], Text.TextID AS [extension], Text.TextSourceDSC AS [root], Text.TextOriginTableNM AS [extension_suffix], Text.TextTXT AS [data], Text.TextTXT AS [base64_data], Text.MimeTypeNM AS [data_format] FROM Text.Text
SELECT DISTINCT Date.TextID AS [KeyLevel1], Date.DateDTS AS [source_last_modified_at], Date.DateDTS AS [source_versioned_at], 'Primary' AS [data_precedence] FROM Text.Date

SELECT DISTINCT Text.TextID AS [KeyLevel1], PatientCrossWalk.EDWPatientID AS [KeyLevel2], PatientCrossWalk.RowSourceDSC AS [root], PatientCrossWalk.PatientID AS [extension], PatientCrossWalk.PatientFullNM AS [last_name], PatientCrossWalk.PatientFullNM AS [first_name], PatientCrossWalk.PatientFullNM AS [middle_name], PatientCrossWalk.GenderCD AS [gender], PatientCrossWalk.BirthDTS AS [date_of_birth] FROM Text.Text INNER JOIN Person.PatientCrossWalk ON Text.EDWPatientID = PatientCrossWalk.EDWPatientID

SELECT DISTINCT Text.TextID AS [KeyLevel1], Encounter.EncounterID AS [KeyLevel2], FacilityAccount.RowSourceDSC AS [root], FacilityAccount.FacilityAccountID AS [extension], FacilityAccount.AdmitDTS AS [admitted_at], FacilityAccount.DischargeDTS AS [discharged_at] FROM Text.Text INNER JOIN Clinical.Encounter ON Text.EncounterID = Encounter.EncounterID INNER JOIN Clinical.FacilityAccount ON Encounter.FacilityAccountID = FacilityAccount.FacilityAccountID

SELECT DISTINCT Text.TextID AS [KeyLevel1], Encounter.EncounterID AS [KeyLevel2], FacilityAccount.FacilityAccountID AS [KeyLevel3], FacilityAccount.RowSourceDSC AS [root], DischargePhysicalLocationID AS [extension] /* always null */ FROM Text.Text INNER JOIN Clinical.Encounter ON Text.EncounterID = Encounter.EncounterID INNER JOIN Clinical.FacilityAccount ON Encounter.FacilityAccountID = FacilityAccount.FacilityAccountID

SELECT DISTINCT Text.TextID AS [KeyLevel1], Encounter.EncounterID AS [KeyLevel2], Provider.EDWProviderID AS [KeyLevel3], FacilityAccount.RowSourceDSC AS [root], Provider.EDWProviderID AS [extension], 'attending' AS [role], Provider.ProviderLastNM AS [last_name], Provider.ProviderFirstNM AS [first_name], Provider.ProviderMiddleNM AS [middle_name] /* mostly null */ FROM Text.Text INNER JOIN Clinical.Encounter ON Text.EncounterID = Encounter.EncounterID INNER JOIN Clinical.FacilityAccount ON Encounter.FacilityAccountID = FacilityAccount.FacilityAccountID INNER JOIN Person.Provider ON Provider.EDWProviderID = FacilityAccount.EDWAttendingProviderID

SELECT DISTINCT Text.TextID AS [KeyLevel1], Text.TextID AS [KeyLevel2], Text.TextSourceDSC AS [root], Text.TextID AS [extension], 'unknown' AS [confidentiality_code], StatusDSC AS [Status], /* needs to be mapped to unknown, preliminary, final, corrected, addendum, in_error, cancelled */ Text.TextSourceDSC AS [type_root], Text.TextTypeCD AS [type_extension], Text.TextTypeDSC AS [type_description] FROM Text.Text

SELECT DISTINCT Date.TextID AS [KeyLevel1], Date.TextID AS [KeyLevel2], Date.TextID AS [key], Date.DateDTS AS [date_of_service], Date.DateDTS AS [source_created_at], Date.EDWLastModifiedDTS AS [source_updated_at] FROM Text.Date

SELECT DISTINCT Text.TextID AS [KeyLevel1], Text.TextID AS [KeyLevel2], ProviderCrossWalk.EDWProviderID AS [KeyLevel3], ProviderCrossWalk.RowSourceDSC AS [root], ProviderCrossWalk.ProviderID AS [extension], 'attending' AS [role], ProviderCrossWalk.ProviderLastNM AS [last_name], ProviderCrossWalk.ProviderFirstNM AS [first_name], ProviderCrossWalk.ProviderMiddleNM AS [middle_name] /* middle name is always null */ FROM Text.Text INNER JOIN Clinical.Encounter ON Text.EncounterID = Encounter.EncounterID INNER JOIN Clinical.FacilityAccount ON Encounter.FacilityAccountID = FacilityAccount.FacilityAccountID INNER JOIN Person.ProviderCrossWalk ON ProviderCrossWalk.EDWProviderID = FacilityAccount.EDWAttendingProviderID
